Articles.Content:
I\'m trbinsc. I\'ve been playing Kerbal Space Program for about two weeks and have found it extremely fun. I have tried to get orbiter to work on my Mac countless times using wine, crossover, etc. but I could never get it to work. Then I find KSP with it\'s awesome little Kerbals, MOAR BOOSTERS and semi-realistic orbital mechanics. Now I\'m sure I\'ll play this game for quite a while. Can\'t wait for the MÃ¼n!

Oh, and It\'s 2:35 AM and I\'m still killing Landing Bill, Jeb (best part of the game!) and Bob
Welcome! And nice job on 1b meters and 87kmps
Thanks, but that\'s actually 1 trillion. It was with mods though, but I never edited any .cfg files.

Thanks, but that\'s actually 1 trillion. It was with mods though, but I never edited any .cfg files.

1,000,000,000 x 10 = 1 trillion.

I\'ve seen Quadrillions.
I got bored. It took about a half hour of real time to do it though. 142 days of Kerbal time.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

Thanks! I got my mÃ¼n rocket ready. might take me a couple times though.

Also, is it spelled mÃ¼n or mun, and does the pronunciation sound similar to fun or moon?

With the umlaut so it sounds like Moon.

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
